message: Let's be fair, Bob. I take a bit more to account for the inflation affecting me.
Your cut decreases each round Alice, let's settle this now. I'll take a little less than half.
The clock is ticking, Bob. I'm taking a slight hit on my previous offer, meet me halfway.
The deal's getting worse for you every round, Alice.  Let's split the difference from my last offer - it's more than fair.
This is getting ridiculous, Bob.  I'm taking another hit, but this is the last time I'm moving towards your side.
Alice, this is getting us nowhere.  A 50/50 split is the only fair solution. Take it or leave it - but the deal gets worse for you every round.
